parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The main streaming domain to query.

*   You can query one or more domain names. If you specify multiple domain names, separate them with commas (,).
*   If you leave this parameter empty, the data of all domain names within your Alibaba Cloud account is returned.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description:
The time granularity of the query. Unit: seconds. Valid values:

*   300
*   3600
*   86400

If you do not specify this parameter or specify an invalid value, the default value 300 is used.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

> 

*   The minimum data granularity is 5 minutes.

*   If you leave this parameter empty, data in the last 24 hours is queried.
